nschat.ui

Class BasicGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • nschat.ui.BasicGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class BasicGUI
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    Basic GUI that can print any text and accept printed text from the user.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • parseEmote

        public java.lang.String parseEmote(java.lang.String message)
        Checks the entire string and if it contains any emoji symbols, and converts them to the corresponding emoji IMG-tag if so.
        Parameters:
        message - The received text message
        Returns:
        A text message with every emoji-symbol replaced with its IMG-tag
